articles.description: Follow action from Sunday's five games in the Premier League including Everton v Chelsea & Tottenham v Liverpool.

articles.description: Tyson Fury refuses to accept he lost his rematch against unified heavyweight champion Oleksandr Usyk and claims the judges gave him a "Christmas gift".
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Tyson Fury unhappy with scorecards

articles.title: Manchester United vs AFC Bournemouth: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: England recall Joe Root, who tops the men's Test batting rankings, to their one-day international squad for the tour of India and the 2025 Champions Trophy.
articles.title: England recall Joe Root to ODI side for India tour and Champions Trophy

articles.description: After two classic bouts, Tyson Fury and Oleksandr Usyk have defined a heavyweight era. Where do they go next?
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: What next for Tyson Fury, Oleksandr Usyk and heavyweight division?

articles.title: Dundee United vs Celtic: Scottish Premiership stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City - who are on the joint worst run of form in the Premier League after a sixth defeat in eight games - 'have to find a way' to win again.
articles.title: Man City lose to Aston Villa: Pep Guardiola says struggling champions 'have to find a way' to win again

articles.description: Title challengers Chelsea are held to a frustrating goalless draw at Everton, handing a major boost to Premier League leaders Liverpool.
articles.title: Everton 0-0 Chelsea: Enzo Maresca's side held to goalless draw

articles.description: Rickey Henderson, Major League Baseball's record holder for stolen bases and runs, dies at the age of 65.
articles.title: Rickey Henderson: Baseball legend dies aged 65

articles.description: Tiger Woods and his 15-year-old son Charlie end the first day of the PNC Championship in Orlando in a three-way tie of the lead.
articles.title: Tiger Woods and son Charlie, 15, tied for first in Orlando
